DOC.brief_summary: schema : Prospective prognostic study The main objective study value Comprehensive Geriatric Assessment predict risk post operative complication lung resection cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Comprehensive Geriatric Assessment Complications Following Lung Resection Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Primary outcome : Post-operative morbidity 30-day : Post operative complication occur 30 day post surgery , evaluate CTCAE V3.0 , Complications grade 2.3.4 analyzed day 1 , day 20 day 30 . Evaluation : Pre operative : Day -30 Day 0 , Post operative : Day 10 , Day 30 , Day 90 , Day 360 . Secondary outcome : Post-operative mortality , Length post operative hospital stay , Length intensive care unit stay , QOL assessment , One year survival .
DOC.criteria: Patient 70 year Lung tumour clinical staging I IIIB receive curative lung resection Diagnosis non small lung cancer invalidate histological finding operative sample psychological condition , social support geographical condition allow study follow Pre operative chemotherapy radiotherapy
DOC.keyword: NSC lung Cancer , Elderly patient , post operative ,
